div.bibl: Svenska Kuriren, April 9, 1925ART EXHIBIT AT THE SWEDISH CLUB

body.p: The Swedish Art Exhibit at the Swedish Club was formally opened for a private view last Saturday, at which time a musical program was rendered and an address made by Carl Beroth. The following day the exposition was opened to the public.
The exhibit comprises 123 paintings and several sculptural pieces. About fifty artists are represented, most of them being local talent.
Programs, and singing by various societies, will be provided each night until the close next Sunday.
